messages.subject: [NHEN-SpeakOut] Homeschooling in the News 4/9/01

messages.messageBody:
April 9
Daily Star : Home-school success stories
http://www.thedailystar.com/news/stories/2001/04/09/homeschool.html
Positive article about homeschool-to-college.

WKRN : Lebanon Hosts Geography Bee
http://www.wkrn.com/Global/story.asp?S=294622
Homeschooler wins.

April 8
Tennessean : Patchwork passion
http://tennessean.com/local/archives/01/04/03974198.shtml?Element_ID=3974198
Teen homeshooler is a quilter.

Minor mentions:

April 8
Washington Post : On Ritalin, In Need of a Third Opinion
http://washingtonpost.com:80/wp-dyn/articles/A57668-2001Apr8.html


Laura Derrick
National Home Education Network
http://www.nhen.org
